message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $900000. Considering its value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to you.
I understand Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. Considering its value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1050000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. After reviewing the situation again, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1025000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1075000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1075000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your offers, Alice. After thorough consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1040000.
